segments.text: I notice a boy in the center of the kitchen, near some open cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's standing on a two-step stool, reaching up high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks incredibly unstable, its legs splayed out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm really worried it's going to tip over any moment now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His hand is deep inside a jar labeled "COOKIE JAR."
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate in his other hand, probably to catch his loot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The nerve of him, climbing like that for cookies!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's totally focused on the cookies, just like the woman is on her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite a risky maneuver he's attempting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope he doesn't take a nasty fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way he's balanced, it seems like a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene makes me incredibly uneasy.
segments.speaker: PAR
